intro: Every route, every passenger, every stop — shape your career as a city bus driver.
description:
Experience the real challenge of managing and driving your own bus in this realistic simulator. In Bus Simulator, you can purchase different buses, upgrade them across three categories, and explore the city through missions or free-ride mode. Each level has a clear goal: reach the marked point on the mini-map and complete the route safely.

Key Features:
- Build your own bus fleet and customize it with powerful upgrades
- Take on level-based missions with clear goals and increasing challenges
- Enjoy Free Ride mode and explore the city at your own pace
- Manage fuel, fatigue, and vehicle condition to keep your routes running smoothly
- Drive carefully to avoid penalties and costly repairs
- Experience realistic bus handling designed to test your skills on every trip

Take the driver’s seat and prove your skills on every route. From careful city driving to managing your bus fleet, every trip is a test of strategy, precision, and timing. Are you ready to become a true bus driving pro?
